Welcome to wittyPy's documentation!
===================================

.. warning:: wittyPy is currently in version |release| and not fully tested. Before deploying your Raspberry Pi project, please run long-time tessts and report any `here <http://www.github.com/elpunkt/wittyPy/issues>`_

WittyPy allows you to control your `WittyPi Realtime Clock <http://www.uugear.com/product/wittypi2/>`_ with Python. Read the guide to learn about the functionality. Read the API reference to dive in deeper or in case you want to fork the project.
